abstract: Geriatric psychiatrist hired by Sumner M Redstone says ailing media mogul has 'legal mental capacity' to oust top Viacom executives Philippe P Dauman and George S Abrams from trust that will manage his $40 billion empire.
lead_paragraph: In excerpts from a report filed with a lawsuit, a psychiatrist says Mr. Redstone had told him he no longer trusted two longtime Viacom confidants.

headline.main: Doctor Says Sumner Redstone Has ‘Legal Mental Capacity’

snippet: In excerpts from a report filed with a lawsuit, a psychiatrist says Mr. Redstone had told him he no longer trusted two longtime Viacom confidants.
